projects.name: Bowling 300 PH
projects.description: Bowling 300 offers top-notch bowling experiences, equipment, and services in the Philippines. Elevate your game with the best in bowling.

projects.name: Vectron Trade Corporation
projects.description: Vectron Trade specializes in innovative trading solutions and services, empowering clients to succeed in the global market.

projects.name: Tondo Supply
projects.description: Tondo Supply provides high-quality, sustainable clothing and accessories. Discover eco-friendly fashion that combines style and responsibility.

projects.name: GPD Advisors
projects.description: GPD Advisors offers expert guidance in insurance and financial planning, helping clients achieve their goals with tailored solutions and personalized service.

projects.name: Project Re-Earth
projects.description: A 2D world-building simulation game focused on environmental restoration. Players rebuild and manage a polluted planet, balancing growth with sustainability. With resource gathering and NPC guidance, the game teaches teenagers about eco-friendly practices in a fun, engaging way.

projects.name: Make It Happen Productions
projects.description: A multimedia company delivering creative services in video production, branding, social media content, and TV commercials. They focus on innovative, strategic solutions to enhance business presence and engagement. Located in Para√±aque City.

projects.name: Mirai Asian Trading
projects.description: A reliable gold trading company specializing in the purchase and sale of gold bars, coins, and jewelry. Committed to secure, transparent transactions and building client trust, Mirai Asian Trading aims to lead the market with integrity and exceptional service.

projects.name: Simply Foods Corporation
projects.description: Simply Foods offers a popular line of vinegar products, including Simply Suka, Simply Suka Spicy, and Sweet & Spicy. The brand highlights Filipino tradition and quality, with a friendly logo featuring TV personality Michael Angelo Lobrin, symbolizing joy and a commitment to authentic flavors.

projects.name: Gently Pure
projects.description: Gently Pure offers a line of skincare products designed for sensitive skin, emphasizing gentle, natural formulations. The product range includes moisturizers and cleansers focused on everyday skin health.

projects.name: Multi-Gyn PH
projects.description: Multi-Gyn PH specializes in feminine care products addressing intimate health and comfort. With a focus on natural balance, their offerings help prevent and treat common vaginal discomforts.

projects.name: Skintilla Beauty
projects.description: Founded in 2019, Skintilla Beauty focuses on pampering skincare products, including beauty bundles for all skin types. The brand combines natural ingredients and luxury for an effective, rejuvenating experience.

projects.name: Padre Pio Mountain of Healing
projects.description: A spiritual sanctuary dedicated to the devotion and healing ministry of Padre Pio. Offers prayer services, guided meditations, and a schedule of masses aimed at fostering faith and healing.
